item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, February 20, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. AI vs. an extra minute in the shower (18 points | 10 comments)

8. TRAVERTINE (CVE-2025-24118): Race condition in XNU (8 points | 2 comments)

19. When Imperfect Systems are Good, Actually: Bluesky’s Lossy Timelines (26 points | 3 comments)
